But whatever it is, it's going to be in my experimental film!

Hey there everybody! This is my foray into playing with a static site generator as a means to learning HTML and CSS. My hope is that, by incrementally improving the look, feel, and accessibility of my little play space, I will be able to improve my basic skills to the point of making something useful.

My long term goal is to, hopefully, migrate my WordPress content to this site so I'm working on some of my own real content.
